name: アフィブログ死ねばいいのにCSS
description: アフィブログを快適に見る用。
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document
    domain('kitimama-matome.net')
    ,domain('exawarosu.net')
    ,domain('shakin.jp')
    ,domain('ayamevip.com')
    ,domain('blog55.fc2.com')
    ,domain('doorblog.jp')
    ,domain('ssflash.net')
    ,domain('ryusoku.com')
    ,domain('2chblog.jp')
    ,domain('2chcopipe.com')
    ,domain('wara2ch.com')
    ,domain('chaos2ch.com')
    ,domain('burusoku-vip.com')
    ,domain('majikichi.com')
    ,domain('hamusoku.com')
    ,domain('sierblog.com')
    ,domain('vipperkizoku.com')
    ,domain('kitimonogatari.com')
    ,domain('asobuoiphone.com')
    ,domain('matacoco.com')
    ,domain('himasoku.com')
    ,domain('kisslog2.com')
    ,domain('military38.com')
    ,domain('alfalfalfa.com')
    ,domain('kikonboti.com')
    
    ,domain('matometanews.com')
    ,domain('itaishinja.com')
    ,domain('blog.livedoor.jp')
    ,domain('blog.jp')
    ,domain('ldblog.jp')
    ,domain('blogspot.jp')
    ,domain('blogspot.biz')
    ,regexp('https?://[a-z0-9]+2ch\.(?:com|net|jp)/.*')
    ,regexp('https?://2ch[a-z0-9]+\.(?:com|net|jp)/.*')
    ,regexp('https?://[a-z0-9]+soku\.(?:com|net|jp)/.*')
    ,regexp('https?://[a-z0-9]+log\.(?:com|net|jp)/.*')
    ,regexp('https?://.+\.blog[0-9]*\.fc2\.com/.*')
{
    *{
        color: #333333 !important;
        background-color: transparent !important;
        font-size: 10pt !important;
        font-family: 'YukarryAA' !important;
        height: auto !important;
        min-height: 0 !important;
        max-height: none !important;
        width: auto !important;
        min-width: 0 !important;
        max-width: none !important;
        position: static !important;
        float: none !important;
        clear: both !important;
    }
    a,a:link{
        color: #000066 !important;
    }
    a:hover,a:active{
        color: #3333cc !important;
    }
    a:visited{
        color: #660066 !important;
    }
    a[href$="jpg"]::before
    ,a[href$="png"]::before
    ,a[href$="gif"]::before
    {
        content: 'link:' attr(href) '→';
    }
}

a[href^="http://newresu1.blog.fc2.com/?c=pickup&id="]
,a[href^="http://moudamepo.com/pick.cgi?code="]
,a[href^="http://newmofu.doorblog.jp/archives/"][href*=".html?"]
,a[href^="http://blog-news.doorblog.jp/"][href*=".html?"]
,a[href^="http://besttrendnews.net/archives/"][href*=".html?"]
,a[href^="http://newpuru.doorblog.jp/archives/"][href*=".html#"]
,a[href^="http://2ch-n.net/feed/"]
,a[href^="http://2ch-2.net/feed/"]
,a[href^="http://2ch-c.net/?gt="]
,a[href^="http://kita-kore.com/archives/"][href*=".html?"]
{
    display: none !important;
}

/*
Karma Blockerで以下のルールを併用推奨。
[Group]
name="BlackSite"
match=any
score = 9999
rule  = $origin.host == 'b.hatena.ne.jp'
rule  = $origin.host == 'www.kitimama-matome.net'
rule  = $origin.host == 'www.shakin.jp'
rule  = $origin.host == 'exawarosu.net'
rule  = $origin.host == 'ayamevip.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'ssflash.net'
rule  = $origin.host == 'burusoku-vip.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'kitimonogatari.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'majikichi.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'asobuoiphone.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'itaishinja.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'sierblog.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'alfalfalfa.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'matometanews.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'kisslog2.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'www.matacoco.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'coliss.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'matome.naver.jp'
rule  = $origin.host == 'kikonboti.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'military38.com'
rule  = $origin.host == 'vipperkizoku.com'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\w+log.com$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\w+soku.com$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\w+2ch\.com$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\2ch\w+\.com$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\.2chblog\.jp$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\.blog\d+\.fc2\.com$'
rule  = $origin.host == 'blog.livedoor.jp'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\.doorblog\.jp$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\.livedoor\.biz$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\.ldblog\.jp$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\.blog\.jp$'
rule  = $origin.host =~ '\.blogspot\.jp$'
*/
